channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hunter Biden disbarred in Connecticut after complaints about gun, tax convictions
item.description: A judge found that Hunter Biden violated several ethical rules for lawyers.

item.title: 4 charged with plotting New Year's Eve attacks in Southern California, prosecutors say
item.description: Federal authorities have announced the arrests of four alleged members of an extremist group suspected of planning coordinated bombing attacks in Sout...

item.title: Authorities say they will release person of interest detained in Brown University shooting
item.description: Officials in Providence say they will release a person of interest detained in a Brown University shooting that killed two students and injured nine

item.title: New York City is getting its first 3 Las Vegas-style casinos

item.title: Baltimore cyclist finds joy in collecting lost hubcaps and stringing them into art
item.description: Cyclist Barnaby Wickham has collected more than 700 lost hubcaps, mostly on his bike rides around Baltimore
